column2: The delegate leads unmoderated caucus discussions and contributes significantly to the working paper drafting process.
column3: The delegate participates in unmoderated caucus discussions and contributes to the working paper drafting process.
column4: The delegate either participates in unmoderated caucus discussions or contributes to the working paper drafting process.
column5: The delegate passively blends into a bloc but does not seem to make any contributions to the discussion or working paper.
column6: The delegate does not attempt to participate in unmoderated caucus discussions or the working paper drafting process.
